post:
Hey all,

Couple of older dedicated servers in Winnipeg we have up for grabs.  Both are 100mbps fair use traffic, 1 IPv4:

1st server:
```
CPU: Dual Xeon X5570
RAM: 20GB
HDD: 2x 1TB HDD
$25/m
```

2nd server:
```
CPU: dual Xeon E5310
RAM: 16GB
HDD: 1x 1TB, 1x 250GB
$15/m 
```

both can be ordered from here: https://freerangecloud.com/products.php?type=15

Note there will be a bit of lead time ( 1 day) to set them up since we don't have automation for any of our dedi's.
